description.en:
Collection of short stories:

[*] Koi ni Ochita Oujisama (The Prince Who Fell In Love)
"Just thinking about it makes me want to cry. Do you know the kind of love I'm talking about?" Shiho lives next door to a prince. Toshiki-sama is the heir of a Noh music master. They shouldn't have been anything more than childhood friends, but...

[*] Cinderella no Tegami (Cinderella's Letter)
Mashita has always been annoyed by one particular guy, in all her years of going to one school, and it just so happens he's the only person she knows in her new class.

[*] Busu (The Ugly One)
Maki got a little arrogant, thanks to her looks when she was a child, and her confidence takes a downhill ride when Hideo-kun, her crush, calls her ugly due to peer pressure.

[*] Iroha ni Hoheto (Old Way of Reading the Japanese Alphabet)
Kiyomi goes to her childhood friend; Atsushi, for love advice; whose face she says she's gotten sick of.

[*] Pizzicato
A girl who has no talent, Miki, has a crush on an up and coming violinist who attends her school, and thinks it's a waste of time to tell him her feelings, since she might be moving soon.
